member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_PIPELINE_FLAGS
member.summary: Defines constants that specify configuration flags for a raytracing pipeline.

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_PIPELINE_FLAGS.D3D12_RAYTRACING_PIPELINE_FLAG_SKIP_TRIANGLES
member.summary: Specifies that for any TraceRay call within this raytracing pipeline, the ray flag should be added in. The resulting combination of ray flags must be valid. The presence of this flag in a raytracing pipeline config doesn't show up in a RayFlags call from a shader. Implementations might be able to optimize pipelines knowing that a particular primitive type need not be considered.
